meanings.sent1: The postemergency response team arrived to assess the damage.
meanings.sent2: It is important to have a postemergency plan in place for future crises.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period following an emergency.
meanings.sent1: We implemented postemergency protocols to ensure safety after the crisis.
meanings.sent2: The postemergency phase required careful monitoring of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The postemergency meeting had a surprisingly cheerful atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Her postemergency actions spoke volumes about her leadership skills.
meanings.sent5: The postemergency period was a time of reflection and lessons learned.
